programme.title: No Stranger Than Love, (2015, Fantasy)

programme.title: Luta Pela Liberdade, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: No estado de Manchukuo, nos anos 30, quatro agentes especiais do Partido Comunista, aps retornarem China, embarcam em uma misso secreta. Exausta por um traidor, a equipe se v rodeada de correo de todos os lados.

programme.title: Malone: Puxando o Gatilho, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Investigador particular perseguido por gangsters, psicopatas e mulheres fatais aps se apropriar de uma misteriosa maleta.

programme.title: Jogo sujo, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Aps assaltar um cassino de Las Vegas, apenas um dos cinco integrantes de uma gangue consegue escapar. O fugitivo decide apagar qualquer memria do seu passado e se torna um xerife. Dez anos depois, os outros quatro ladres rastreiam o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: O ltimo assalto, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Trs idosos veteranos do crime decidem participar de um roubo a um cofre subterrneo do depsito de jias Hatton Garden, em Londres. Com uma furadeira industrial, os criminosos planejam entrar para a Histria atravessando as paredes do cofre em dois dias.

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: As complicaes surgem durante uma situao perigosa de refm em um restaurante.

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Frente a Frente, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Cheung Sung-bong um oficial da Unidade Regional de Crime que trabalhou na frente durante muitos anos. O seu protegido, Yau Kong-ngo, respeita-o e consegue chegar at ele. No entanto, o destino coloca-os uns contra os outros.

programme.title: Operao Perigosa, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que uma transao de drogas no d certo, dois traficantes nova-iorquinos se deslocam para Miami, onde estabelecem uma operao de fraude de crdito lucrativo.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Encontro Com Destino
programme.desc: A equipe kakashi encontra itachi uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Kakashi diz a todos para no olharem nos olhos sharingan de itachi. Kakashi se prepara para enfrentar itachi sozinho e pede que naruto d cobertura.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto
programme.desc: Guy lamenta sua asneira ao ver seus trs alunos presos pela priso de gua.determinado a parar kisame, guy o desafia usando o nunchaku, sua arma favorita. um super taijutsu contra uma super fora humana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esfera Secreta De Chama
programme.desc: Vov chiyo e sakura salvam naruto do genjutsu de itachi.no mesmo instante, kakashi comea um contra-ataque. Uma batalha ninja de nvel alto comea e kakashi exibe toda sua destreza e percio usando uma ttica sutil.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Do Jinchurik!
programme.desc: Seus inimigos derrotados, kisame e itachi, parecem ter sido clones, cujos poderes e aparecimento foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Morte Do Gaara
programme.desc: As equipes kakashi e guy fazem uma pausa.vov chiyo observa naruto cochilar e lembra de sasori quando criana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!
programme.desc: As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O nico jeito de quebrar a barreira removendo os cinco selos de uma s vez.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada

programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Trapped, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: The Jennings fight for their daughter's life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: Panic Room, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: When her home is invaded by three armed robbers, a divorced woman and her young daughter hide in their specially designed panic room but end up in a deadly cat-and-mouse game anyway.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Ang Lee directs the film about private Billy Lynn who is brought home for a victory tour after becoming a hero following an Iraq battle.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Pieces of April, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: A head strong young woman, who has alienated her parents is forced to confront their troubled relationship when she learns that her mother, is dying of cancer.

programme.title: Come Away, (2020, Fantasy)
programme.desc: When their eldest brother dies, Peter and Alice seek to save their parents from despair until they are forced to choose between home and imagination, setting the stage for their iconic journeys into Wonderland and Neverland.

programme.title: Rustlers' Rhapsody, (1985, Western)
programme.desc: The Wild West goes wacko when the Greatest Fast-Drawin', Silver-Spurred, Geetar Playin', Singing Cowboy movie matinee idol Rex O'Herlihan hits the saddle in Rustlers' Rhapsody, a cockeyed, affectionate send-up of the '40s B-movie Western.

programme.title: The Long Riders, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: Four theatrical families of the 1980s re-create the saga of the 1860s James Gang: Stacy and James Keach, David, Keith and Robert Carradine, Randy and Dennis Quaid and Christopher and Nicholas Guest.

programme.title: American Outlaws, (2001, Western)
programme.desc: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Slow West, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter (Michael Fassbender) keeps his true motive a secret from the nave Scottish teenager (Kodi Smit-McPhee) he's offered to serve as bodyguard and guide while the youth searches for his beloved in 1800s Colorado.

programme.title: The Timber, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: In the wild west, two brothers embark on a journey to collect a bounty in a desperate attempt to save their home: but what they find along the way is more than they bargained for.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Western)

programme.title: Ephraim's Rescue, (2013, Faith & Spirituality)

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Love and Monsters, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Push, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Superhumans defy a government plot to harness and abuse their powers. Chris Evans and Dakota Fanning (the TWILIGHT films) team in a pulse-pounding paranormal thriller.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: XXX, (2002, Espionage Action)

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)

programme.title: Go, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon and Neve Campbell star in a steamy story of murder, intrigue and sex. Rated: R

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Pi, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature. Pushed to his limits, he spirals between brilliance and obsession in this gripping, groundbreaking debut from Darren Aronofsky.

programme.title: Funny Pages, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenage cartoonist rejects the comforts of his suburban life and leaves home in a misguided quest for soul.

programme.title: Cool World, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: Troll, (1986, Horror)

programme.title: Cell, (2016, Thriller)

programme.desc: A prostitute (Pam Grier) and a revolutionary (Margaret Markov) escape from a Philippine woman's prison. Disguised as nuns and chained together, they head into jungle, pursued by local police and a small-time kingpin enlisted to bring them back.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Truck Turner, (1974, Blaxploitation)
programme.desc: Isaac Hayes is a bounty hunter who is after a strong-armed pimp who has skipped bail. In the hunt, the pimp is killed but his girlfriend takes a contract out on Hayes.

programme.title: Bobbie Jo And The Outlaw, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: A stunning carhop who wants to be a country singer and her sweetheart who dreams he's Billy the Kid become involved in robbery and murder.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are stuck in the clink, King Cobra addresses the starving people of Nanohana. Will his unbelievable revelation drive his subjects past the brink of rebellion?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!

programme.title: A royal imposter has the rebel army hell-bent on bringing Cobras reign to a violent end. Meanwhile, Luffy and his mates find themselves in deep trouble and even deeper water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!

programme.title: Sanji shows up in the nick of time to make the crocs cough up the key to Luffys freedom, but the ravenous reptiles spit up something else instead.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!

programme.title: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffys not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile

programme.title: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land

programme.title: Vivi arrives in Alubarna with just enough time to stop the rebellion, but the agents of Baroque Works lurk in every corner, waiting to sabotage her plans for peace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna

programme.title: Sanji buys Vivi some time by mixing it up with a foe of many faces. Outside Alubarnas walls, Chopper and Usopp tangle with Miss Merry Christmas and her slugging sidekick.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo

programme.title: Usopp finally shows some courage by using a five-ton hammer to play whack-a-mole with Miss Merry Christmas. He may be bluffing, but the distraction lets Chopper zero in on the enemys weakness.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4

programme.title: Choppers Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage

programme.title: Vivi continues preparations to blow up the palace; Zorro puts his steel to the test against a lethal blade-man; Sanji tries to overcome his inability to kick a foxy lady!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Transformed into Nami! Bon Clay's Rapid-Fire Ballet Kenpo!

programme.title: Things dont look good for the prettiest Straw Hat. Namis about to tangle with a thorny adversary, and the weapon Usopp built her is only good for party tricks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's Cyclone Advisory! Clima Tact Burst!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals his sinister motives for attacking Alabasta, and Nami tries to end her duel with Miss Doublefinger by unleashing the Clima Tacts ultimate weapon: a devastatingly lethal tornado!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Passed Down In The Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon Pluton!

programme.title: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel or die trying.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Of Powerful Swordplay! Ability To Cut Steel And The Rhythm Things Have!

programme.title: Koza the leader of the rebel army finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabastas drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!

programme.title: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivis cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!

programme.title: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it wont matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sand Croc and Water Luffy!... The Second Round of the Duel!

programme.title: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his countrys greatest secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: That Looks Croc-ish!... Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!

programme.title: With the walls crumbling down around them, Crocodile attacks Luffy with a poisoned pirate hook. Meanwhile, Vivi draws a bead on the bombers, but can she stop them in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Draws Near!... This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base

programme.title: The Straw Hats team up to give Vivi one last shot at disarming the bomb that threatens to destroy her city. She succeeds in cutting the fuse, but Crocodile has a backup plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country

programme.title: Pells sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodiles poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabastas oppressor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta.

programme.title: Crocodile is defeated, the rain has returned to Alabasta, and Vivis people are eager to rebuild their kingdom. As for the Straw Hats, they have a fleet of marines breathing down their necks.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!

programme.title: Now that the rebellion is over, Vivi must make an important decision about her future. The Straw Hats are ready to hoist the anchor, but an ambiguous villain has stolen the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pirates' Banquet And Operation Escape From Alabasta!

programme.title: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It All Started On That Day...! Vivi Tells The Story Of Her Adventure!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but theres no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and theres a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scent of danger! The seventh member is Nico Robin!

programme.title: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Patient! The Untold Story Of The Rumble Ball!

programme.title: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!

programme.title: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry

programme.title: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the worlds largest firework.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Make It Bloom! Usopp The Man And The Eight-Foot Shell!

programme.title: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman

programme.title: A barrage of Marine cannon balls forces the Straw Hats to seek refuge on an uncharted island. Once ashore, the crew encounters a strange old man living amongst a herd of goats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zenny Of The Island Of Goats And The Pirate Ship In The Mountains!

programme.title: Old man Zenny made a fortune lending money to scallywags, but he always dreamed of becoming a pirate himself. When the marines set out to trap the Straw Hats, the wily hermit may finally get his wish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: How's Tricks? The Designs of Zenny the Moneylender!

programme.title: Zenny gets more than he bargained for when he embarks on his maiden pirate voyage. The Straw Hats may have made a friend for life, but what are they gonna do about those pesky marines?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whereabouts of the Island Treasure! Attack of the Zenny Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist whos obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Legend Of The Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo Of Luluka Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault.
programme.sub-title: Lupin Laughs at the Alarm Bell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them.
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Kannon statuette.
programme.sub-title: Detective Hanshichi, The Tenth Year Promise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's super computer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Aurora Droplet, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.
programme.sub-title: The Face of Goodbye at the National Border

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious World of Madame X

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Drama)

programme.title: Sugar Colt, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: To avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Tom has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruis vikings vai Gr-Bretanha com a inteno de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa nufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se at chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operao Zodaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos msticos - 12 cabeas de bronze dos animais do zodaco chins.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendrio cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial sovitico, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermnio de Sobibr, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A ltima Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristos chegam a uma ilha remota com a inteno de converter os aldees pagos sua religio. O primeiro busca conquist-los com compreenso e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidao e na violncia. medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldees devem decidir de que lado esto, e os homens, at onde esto dispostos a ir e quanto sangue ser derramado.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruis vikings vai Gr-Bretanha com a inteno de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa nufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se at chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operao Zodaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos msticos - 12 cabeas de bronze dos animais do zodaco chins.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendrio cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial sovitico, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermnio de Sobibr, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A ltima Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristos chegam a uma ilha remota com a inteno de converter os aldees pagos sua religio. O primeiro busca conquist-los com compreenso e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidao e na violncia. medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldees devem decidir de que lado esto, e os homens, at onde esto dispostos a ir e quanto sangue ser derramado.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Aps uma misso, uma enfermeira do exrcito retorna fazenda da sua av em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: O Dirio de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu dirio. Desde ficar em recuperao em matemtica at os esforos para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixo atual.

programme.title: Hora de Recomear
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica precisa decidir entre ter uma vida divertida e sem preocupaes da cidade grande, ou uma vida rural sem frescuras e muito trabalho duro para descobrir quem ela realmente .

programme.title: Os Dez Mandamentos
programme.desc: Moiss ouve a voz de Deus vinda de uma Accia de Fogo, que o inspira a confrontar o fara do Egito.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Moises
programme.desc: O rei do Egito avisado da profecia de que Messias chegar. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebs do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Trenk, O Cavaleiro Trapalho
programme.desc: Trenk quer tornar-se um cavaleiro e liberar sua famlia. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do drago e condecorado pelo Duque.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro
programme.desc: Quando Mats encontra um par de calas que contm uma quantidade ilimitada de dinheiro no bolso a vida

programme.title: Dummie A Mmia e a Tumba de Achnetut
programme.desc: Dummie est com saudades de casa e quer voltar para visitar o tmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Espio Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do servio secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem soluo h quarenta anos.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata
programme.desc: Destemido e cheio de risadas. O Capito Sharky e sua animada tripulao partem para aventuras emocionantes e assustadoras, nas quais aprendem que, mais do que ser o pirata mais temvel, preciso ser um bom amigo

programme.title: Bons Pra Cachorro
programme.desc: Uma histria de amizade e aventura entre Josh, um co do campo desalinhado, descontrado e amigvel, e Cassie, uma cadela mimada da cidade, que no gosta da vida no campo. Eles logo descobrem que no so to diferente do que imaginavam e, juntos, formam uma grande equipe para proteger seu lar

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma histria da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela filha do Rei.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Aps sofrer um grave acidente de carro, April desperta sem lembrar do que aconteceu.

programme.title: Eles Existem
programme.desc: Para cinco amigos, o final de semana em uma cabana pelos remotos bosques do Texas ser uma aventura repleta de festas. Mas tudo muda quando o que parecia s diverso se torna um terror ao serem perseguidos pelo feroz e lendrio P Grande.

programme.title: A Face do Mal
programme.desc: Ao lado dos pais e das duas irms, Evan Asher (Harrison Gilbertson) um jovem tmido e pouco socivel que se muda para uma grande casa, cujo passado marcado por uma famlia que perdeu todos os filhos. Aproveitando o baixo preo e sem problemas supersties, os Asher se mudam para o local. L, Evan aproveita o tempo livre para desenvolver uma amizade/namoro com a vizinha Sam (Liana Liberato). Curiosos, os dois vo explorar o passado sombrio do local e despertar foras nada amigveis.

programme.title: Fora de Alcance
programme.desc: Um empresrio sem escrpulos, contrata o jovem rastreador, Ben, para gui-lo pelo rido deserto de Mojave.

programme.title: Uma Foto Antes de Morrer
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos est envolvido em uma coliso entre um veado e um veculo na Rssia rural. Em busca de ajuda, eles tropeam em uma cabana, onde encontram uma foto retratando seu acidente.

programme.title: Ouija Exorcismo
programme.desc: Em 1985, um exorcista famoso prendeu um demnio horrvel dentro de um tabuleiro Ouija. Pensando que o tabuleiro era um jogo, seu filho jogou sem obedecer s regras e soltou o demnio.

programme.title: Siembamba: A Cano Do Mal
programme.desc: O choro incessante do seu beb, sentimentos crescentes de culpa e paranoia levam Chloe a uma depresso sombria. Desorientada, ela visita o psiclogo, Dr. Timothy Reed, que diagnostica seus pensamentos e sentimentos como depresso ps-parto. O mundo ao seu redor implode e fica claro que ela e seu filho esto em perigo iminente. Mas de qu?

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: Um grande tubaro branco persegue incansavelmente trs praticantes de caiaque em uma ilha remota. Enquanto esperam pela chegada de ajuda, a mar comea a subir, forando-os a voltar para as guas mortais. Agora a corrida comeou enquanto o tubaro ameaa abat-los no caminho de volta ao continente.

programme.title: Zumbiologia - Aproveite essa Noite
programme.desc: Lung (Michael Ning) e Chi-Yeung (Louis Cheung) so dois jovens melhores amigos que vivem a vida de maneira irresponsvel e despreocupada. Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e comea a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heris e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu pais, uma pobre familia viaja em busca de melhores condicoes de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles sao atacados por uma gangue de crueis fora-da-lei, que so poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: A Maldio da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma rea rural com seu filho recm-nascido. Eles logo comeam a receber avisos sobre espritos malignos na regio, mas a jovem famlia prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Voce
programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, aps uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doena.

programme.title: Sem evidncias
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satnicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.title: Passagem Para a Vida
programme.desc: Um estranho chega a uma pequena cidade planejando roubar o banco, mas seus planos tomam um rumo improvvel.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres dos anos 1960, um zelador idoso convence um executivo com restries de teto de vidro a ajud-lo a roubar um punhado de diamantes de seu empregador, a London Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) est com vrios problemas em sua vida. O prdio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano est sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dvida. O escolhido Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat v at seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistans se v em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de refns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dvida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Assassinos Annimos
programme.desc: A tenso est insuportvel dentro do Assassinos Annimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos esto tentando descobrir qual deles est por trs de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: Una extraa coincidencia hace que dos bandas atraquen el mismo banco a la misma hora. Un peculiar cliente (Patrick Dempsey) y una resuelta cajera (Ashley Judd) pondrn en juego su ingenio y su valor para intentar frustrar el golpe.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer londrino que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, intransigente e politicamente incorreto, tm a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixo s crianas e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele no tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistans se v em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de refns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dvida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.

programme.title: Albatroz
programme.desc: Beth, uma adolescente estudiosa, fica amiga de Emilia, uma aspirante a romancista recm-chegada cidade. Emilia logo comea a ter um caso com o pai de Beth e isso pode ser a porta de entrada para consequncias devastadoras.

programme.title: A Recompensa
programme.desc: Depois de passar 12 anos na priso, um famoso ladro est de volta para receber o que lhe devido.

programme.title: Quem Morto Sempre Aparece

programme.title: Luffy quer que Zoro seja seu companheiro a todo custo, e prope libert-lo para juntos enfrentarem o Capito Morgan.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E3

programme.title: Navegando ao lado de Zoro, Luffy relembra seu passado e conhece Nami e o bando do pirata Buggy, o Palhao.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E4

programme.title: Para tentar se salvar e ficar com o mapa para a Grand Line, Nami engana Luffy e o entrega a Buggy.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E5

programme.title: Mohji, o Domador de Feras e imediato de Buggy, ataca Luffy a mando de seu capito!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E6

programme.title: Zoro enfrenta Cabaji, o Acrobata, enquanto Luffy enfrenta Buggy e Nami procura o mapa para a Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E7

programme.title: Luffy e os demais precisam derrotar Buggy, o Palhao, para pr fim onda de terror que o pirata colocou na ilha.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E8

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro e Nami chegam a mais uma ilha, onde conhecero o temvel Capito Usopp e seu exrcito de milhes... De mentiras.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E9

programme.title: Klahadore probe Kaya de ver Usopp, como uma promessa feita aos pais de jovem de cuidar dela. E os piratas encontram, em sua busca por um novo navio, o esquisito Jango, o hipnotizador.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E10

programme.title: A verdade sobre Klahadore revelada, mas o povo da vila e Kaya no acreditam em Usopp quando ele tenta desmascarar o mordomo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E11

programme.title: Os Piratas do Capito Kuro se preparam para invadir o vilarejo de Usopp e Kaya, mas Luffy e seus companheiros tambm esto a postos para impedir a invaso.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E12

programme.title: Luffy e Zoro obliteram os homens de Jango, que fica sem alternativas a no ser seu trunfo: Os Irmos Nyaban, que atacaro o espadachim sem piedade!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E13

programme.title: O Capito Kuro mostra sua verdadeira identidade, e Kaya entra em cena para tentar det-lo. Para que o bando tenha chance, Luffy precisa acordar!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E14

programme.title: Os amigos de Usopp fogem com Kaya e Jango segue atrs deles, enquanto Luffy encara Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E15

programme.title: Luffy enfrenta Kuro na praia e Kaya e os meninos fogem de Jango, o Hipnotizador!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E16

programme.title: Kaya recompensa os esforos dos Chapus de Palha com um navio! O Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E17

programme.title: Na lendria Ilha dos Tesouros, Luffy e o bando encontram estranhos animais e um homem ainda mais estranho chamado Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E18

programme.title: No passado, Zoro treinava constantemente contra Kuina, mas nunca conseguiu venc-la. Eles juraram que, um dia, um deles seria o melhor espadachim do mundo. Mas o destino quis diferente.
programme.desc: One Piece - S1E19

programme.title: O Feiticeiro Kaima Cerebron capaz de entrar nos sonhos das pessoas e manipular suas mentes. Com isso, o prximo alvo do Imprio Crisis nada mais que a prpria Reiko, fazendo-a atacar e temer Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E12

programme.title: Parecia ser um presente vindo dos cus... Uma bela garota, Kirara, junta de seu pai, aparecem dos cus, Shigeru e Kengo veem tudo.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E13

programme.title: Kilza novamente usa criaes para realizar seus planos. Dessa vez controlando suas mentes atravs de um talism que deixa invejosas e malignas.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E33

programme.title: Jaspion encontra o filho do professor e cientista Katayama. O menino est chateado por sentir a ausncia do pai, mas na verdade o professor foi sequestrado pela quadrilha de Macgaren para projetar uma fortaleza indestrutvel.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E34

programme.title: Jaspion e Kanoko sonham com sete raios de luz que atingem cinco crianas, um heri e um beb. Edin vem Terra ajuda-los a interpretar o sonho.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E35

programme.title: Edin leva a famlia Nanbara para o seu mundo, um porto seguro contra os ataques de Satan Goss. Enquanto isso, Kilza e Macgaren executam seu prximo plano.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E36

programme.title: O cozinheiro espacial Bragul e Macgaren se unem para raptar Miya e atrair Jaspion para uma emboscada.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E37

programme.title: Miki uma menina com poderes sobrenaturais. Resgatada por Macgaren de um desmoronamento ela pressionada a ajud-lo. Macgaren usa o poder de Miki para corromper os cidados da vila.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E38

programme.title: A irm da bruxa Kilza, Kilmaza, surge com os ninjas espaciais e pe em prtica seu plano de fazer as pessoas odiarem Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E39

programme.title: Kilmaza implanta diamantes falsos na terra para corromper o corao das pessoas e trazer caos ao pas
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E40

programme.title: Ele, que possui velocidade mxima de 1500km/h, a super mquina Ridron, corre com tudo para socorrer Reiko e seus amigos, sequestrados pelo Guerreiro Kaima Gainagamus.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E5

programme.title: Shigeru fez uma promessa: ficar amigo do Monstro Kaima Kurukuruten. No entanto, Kurukuruten deu a ele uma terrvel ordem: eliminar a humanidade. RX chega para lidar com essa situao, derrotando o ardiloso Kurukuruten.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E6

programme.title: Yusuke Morita, amigo de infncia de Issamu, est em fuga. Os Demnios do Imprio Crisis foram enviados para recuperar o projeto de uma arma secreta: um satlite de gs venenoso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E7

programme.title: Existe um segredo por trs de Tomoko Kishida, uma garota super dotada. Ela fruto da relao de uma mulher humana com um Crisiano, descendente de Crisis, possuindo poderes ocultos.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E8

programme.title: A sede de destruio de Satan Goss no tem tamanho. Macgaren treina com seu pai para derrotar Jaspion. Kilmaza continua executando seus planos malignos. Jaspion precisa encontrar logo na quinta criao.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E45

programme.title: Comea a ltima batalha onde Jaspion e Edin enfrentam Satan Goss e Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E46

programme.title: Toha Yamashi discpulo e filho adotivo de Tetsuzan, representante do cl ninja Togakure. Para defender a localizao de Pako, Toha deve enfrentar ninjas de todo o mundo e impedi-los de usar esse grande poder para o mal.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E3

programme.title: Toha flagra os Karasutengu assaltando uma joalheria. Durante a perseguio emboscado por Kanin Chang Kung Fu, um velho ninja que usa feitios para acabar com a valentia do adversrio.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E4

programme.title: The House With a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
programme.sub-title: The House With a Clock in Its Walls (2018)

programme.title: The House With a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
